education.degree: Bachelor of Technology Computer Science and Engineering

highSchool.name: Anand Swaroop Arya Saraswati Vidya Mandir Roorkee, UK

projects.name: AI-Generated Content Detector
details: Developed a program to identify and filter AI-generated content, ensuring less exposure to dark data.
Designed a classification model using transformers, achieving accuracy in detecting AI-generated text.
Built the solution with Python, TensorFlow, and PostgreSQL, enabling real-time verification for 10,000+ entries.

projects.name: OneRoof
details: Built a platform connecting agencies with businesses, featuring advanced search filters and a rating-based discovery system, reducing agency search time.
Developed user authentication, messaging features, and a PostgreSQL database to manage listings, ensuring scalability and seamless data handling.
Deployed using Docker and achieved 99.9% uptime, facilitating successful collaborations.
Spearheaded the design and development of safety device using cutting-edge technology, impacting 1,000+ users.
Conducted comprehensive acceptance testing of web and mobile applications, ensuring alignment with functional requirements.

hobbies.name: Technology Enthusiast
details: Passionate about exploring new technologies and their applications.
